subject: Warning,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_81353.5ffca679.3aeecbc6_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Everyone please be careful with file storage, I had lost most all of mine  
because my back up drive failed, I can't get them back, i lost the MFR, and 
I  don't know what to do now, lost all, my family and horse pictures, music  
collection, all the spirit files, all my saved Theme collection, a program 
I can  never get back, so, please everyone, make at least two different back 
up  drives. sf

--part1_81353.5ffca679.3aeecbc6_boundary
